
{{alias}}
    Platform-specific path segment separator.

    Examples
    --------
    > var parts;
    > if ( {{alias:@stdlib/utils/is-windows}} ) {
    >     parts = 'foo\\bar\\baz'.split( {{alias}} );
    > } else {
    >     parts = 'foo/bar/baz'.split( {{alias}} );
    > }
    > parts
    [ 'foo', 'bar', 'baz' ]

    See Also
    --------
